short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Claims the bonus points of twitch channel you are watching without you leaving fullscreen. Simply clicks bonus button automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Claims the extra bonus points of the channel you are watching on twitch without you leaving full screen.
Enjoy the content without interruption.

FAQ:

    Do I need to keep the twitch livestream tab open in browser?

        Yes. If you are not having any livestream open the addon is sitting idle doing nothing. Feed addon some twitch livestreams.

    Can I navigate to other tabs?

        Yes. You just need to open livestream on twitch channel you want to get bonus points in one of the tabs. Later you can be free to roam on any other tabs.

    Does it work in multiple tabs simultaneously?

        Yes. this works for multiple tabs and even multiple windows. In case you want it to work in private window then please allow the permission in addons menu to do so.

    Can I minimise browser window and still grind bonus points?

        Yes. Bonus , you can even mute stream or tab and still grind. That green button ain't gonna miss you ;) 


Nerd Note: Simply calls click event of the bonus button if available and checks again in 10 seconds.

You can reach me for any query here on telegram - https://t.me/k2here
